title: Schadenfreude: Pleasure in Others' Pain
description: A 60-second lesson on Schadenfreude: Pleasure in Others' Pain.

hook.text: You see someone slip on ice and feel a tiny guilty thrill. German has a word for that exact feeling.

discovery.text: English borrowed the word directly because no English equivalent existed.

climax.text: The word's adoption into English proves that untranslatable words fill real gaps in other languages.
